name: Planet Hackers
description:
***********************************************************************************

In a distant future.
A new way of planetary conquest exists.
Where only the most powerful people have access.
They fight over the control of a Beacon
That hacks the core of the planets
Giving the winner the chance to change the planet to their will.

Azel is heir to the throne of a powerful dynasty.
Cocky and arrogant, he just participates for the fun of expanding
his family legacy.

Tarja the Warmother of a legion of warriors.
Stoic and mighty, found this is the best way to conquer the universe.

***********************************************************************************
 

Player 1 - Azel:
WASD - movement
X - jump
C - base attack
V - heavy attack
B - block

Player 2 - Tarja:
Arrows  -movement
U - jump
I - base attack
O - heavy attack
P - block

Game controllers are tested only for Player 1, we don't really know if Player 2 controls are working correctly but feel free to test and let us know.
